30class V8_EXPORT ExtensionConfiguration {
31 public:
32 ExtensionConfiguration() : name_count_(0), names_(nullptr) {}
33 ExtensionConfiguration(int name_count, const char* names[])
34 : name_count_(name_count), names_(names) {}
35
36 const char** begin() const { return &names_[0]; }
37 const char** end() const { return &names_[name_count_]; }
38
39 private:
40 const int name_count_;
41 const char** names_;
42};
43

383 class V8_NODISCARD Scope {
384 public:
385 explicit V8_INLINE Scope(Local<Context> context) : context_(context) {
386 context_->Enter();
387 }
388 V8_INLINE ~Scope() { context_->Exit(); }
389
390 private:
391 Local<Context> context_;
392 };
393
399 class V8_EXPORT V8_NODISCARD BackupIncumbentScope final {
400 public:
405 explicit BackupIncumbentScope(Local<Context> backup_incumbent_context);
406 ~BackupIncumbentScope();
407
408 private:
409 friend class internal::Isolate;
410
411 uintptr_t JSStackComparableAddressPrivate() const {
412 return js_stack_comparable_address_;
413 }
414
415 Local<Context> backup_incumbent_context_;
416 uintptr_t js_stack_comparable_address_ = 0;
417 const BackupIncumbentScope* prev_ = nullptr;
418 };
419
420 V8_INLINE static Context* Cast(Data* data);
421
422 private:
423 friend class Value;
424 friend class Script;
425 friend class Object;
426 friend class Function;
427
428 static void CheckCast(Data* obj);
429
430 internal::Address* GetDataFromSnapshotOnce(size_t index);
431 Local<Value> SlowGetEmbedderData(int index);
432 void* SlowGetAlignedPointerFromEmbedderData(int index);
433};

435// --- Implementation ---
436
437Local<Value> Context::GetEmbedderData(int index) {
438#ifndef V8_ENABLE_CHECKS
439 using A = internal::Address;
440 using I = internal::Internals;
441 A ctx = internal::ValueHelper::ValueAsAddress(this);
442 A embedder_data =
443 I::ReadTaggedPointerField(ctx, I::kNativeContextEmbedderDataOffset);
444 int value_offset =
445 I::kEmbedderDataArrayHeaderSize + (I::kEmbedderDataSlotSize * index);
446 A value = I::ReadRawField<A>(embedder_data, value_offset);
447#ifdef V8_COMPRESS_POINTERS
448 // We read the full pointer value and then decompress it in order to avoid
449 // dealing with potential endiannes issues.
450 value = I::DecompressTaggedField(embedder_data, static_cast<uint32_t>(value));
451#endif
452
453 auto isolate = reinterpret_cast<v8::Isolate*>(
454 internal::IsolateFromNeverReadOnlySpaceObject(ctx));
455 return Local<Value>::New(isolate, value);
456#else
457 return SlowGetEmbedderData(index);
458#endif
459}
460
461void* Context::GetAlignedPointerFromEmbedderData(Isolate* isolate, int index) {
462#if !defined(V8_ENABLE_CHECKS)
463 using A = internal::Address;
464 using I = internal::Internals;
465 A ctx = internal::ValueHelper::ValueAsAddress(this);
466 A embedder_data =
467 I::ReadTaggedPointerField(ctx, I::kNativeContextEmbedderDataOffset);
468 int value_offset = I::kEmbedderDataArrayHeaderSize +
469 (I::kEmbedderDataSlotSize * index) +
470 I::kEmbedderDataSlotExternalPointerOffset;
471 return reinterpret_cast<void*>(
472 I::ReadExternalPointerField<internal::kEmbedderDataSlotPayloadTag>(
473 isolate, embedder_data, value_offset));
474#else
475 return SlowGetAlignedPointerFromEmbedderData(index);
476#endif
477}
478
479void* Context::GetAlignedPointerFromEmbedderData(int index) {
480#if !defined(V8_ENABLE_CHECKS)
481 using A = internal::Address;
482 using I = internal::Internals;
483 A ctx = internal::ValueHelper::ValueAsAddress(this);
484 A embedder_data =
485 I::ReadTaggedPointerField(ctx, I::kNativeContextEmbedderDataOffset);
486 int value_offset = I::kEmbedderDataArrayHeaderSize +
487 (I::kEmbedderDataSlotSize * index) +
488 I::kEmbedderDataSlotExternalPointerOffset;
489 Isolate* isolate = I::GetIsolateForSandbox(ctx);
490 return reinterpret_cast<void*>(
491 I::ReadExternalPointerField<internal::kEmbedderDataSlotPayloadTag>(
492 isolate, embedder_data, value_offset));
493#else
494 return SlowGetAlignedPointerFromEmbedderData(index);
495#endif
496}
497
498template <class T>
499MaybeLocal<T> Context::GetDataFromSnapshotOnce(size_t index) {
500 if (auto slot = GetDataFromSnapshotOnce(index); slot) {
501 internal::PerformCastCheck(
502 internal::ValueHelper::SlotAsValue<T, false>(slot));
503 return Local<T>::FromSlot(slot);
504 }
505 return {};
506}
507
508Context* Context::Cast(v8::Data* data) {
509#ifdef V8_ENABLE_CHECKS
510 CheckCast(data);
511#endif
512 return static_cast<Context*>(data);
513}
